channel.title: How to change client ip to my ip dds speced
channel.description: hod do i change client ip to my ip

item.title: How to change client ip to my ip dds speced
item.dc:creator: @statsflamescape statsflamescape
item.description:
@statsflamescape wrote:

I can’t remember if you needs go into the client or sources file but gta go into client.java file and goto edit then find… Type in the ip of the server and click find. Once you find it replace it with your ip address. After that save, compile and run!!! Cuz ur done;). Btw that’s how to change the ip on the client but if you don’t have a ip in the first place you might want to check up a tut on how to start a server:)

Read full topic
item.source: How to change client ip to my ip dds speced
